text: Unale bhaneh ke ‘‘yasale timro dumbila'i aphno dumbiharuma misa'ine kura garera, nihsandeha timimathi an'yaya gardacha. Adhikatara sajhedaraharu eka arkamathi jyadati nai garne gardachan. Ho, jasale imana lya'e ra asala karma gare, tiniharu baheka, ra yasta nikai kama chan.’’ Ra ‘‘da'udale’’ thane ki (yasa ghatanabata) hamile unako pariksa gareka haum taba unale aphno palanakartasita ksamayacana gare ra pascatapa gardai sajada gare ra allahatira pravrtta bha'e
